author: The Virtual Reality Show
description:
Questies rejoice! You now have your own ultimate guide to the top 10 things I think every Meta Quest owner that plays VRChat NEEDS. Did I miss something? Comment your own standalone “must-haves” below. :)

 Get VM Key to voice change on Quest: 
https://www.voicemod.net/en/vmkey/


5% off Voicemod Pro with code: PHIABUNNY
https://x.la/l/Nos4XLvM

Join my Discord!:
https://discord.gg/phia
Daily TVRS VRChat Group Hangouts:
https://vrc.group/TVRS.0429

00:20 - GoGo Loco
01:32 - BoboVR Headstrap
02:22 - Developer Mode

03:35 - Quest Optimizer

06:41 - Knuckles Straps

08:23 - PC Link
09:10 - My VRChat Group Hangouts

title: Quest VR "Must-Haves" you NEED! [VRChat]
